FOUND IN: Straight: Five consecutive ranks with different suits, e.g., 5 of hearts, 6 of diamonds, 7 of clubs, 8 of spades, and 9 of hearts.
Copper alloy: A metallic compound composed primarily of copper, often mixed with tin or other metals for increased strength and resistance to corrosion.
Vielle (medieval fiddle with a long neck and frets)
Smear with paint or another substance
Bourse de Paris (historical reference, now part of Euronext Paris)
